other_tests.findings: Lesion on left elbow which was biopsied and found to be consistent with sarcoid.

The tip of the right PICC projects over the distal SVC. Lung volumes are low. Linear atelectasis re-visualized in the right midlung. No new consolidation, pneumothorax, or large pleural effusion. Size of cardiac silhouette unchanged. Surgical clips project over the low neck at midline.
